page.title: 09FARMING,CARY FITZPAINE
page.content: Most of the land in our area is cropland, grassland and woodland. There are ten farms in our area and one of the biggest is Cary Fitzpaine farm which is owned by the Church Commissioners. For the last fifty three years it has been farmed by the same family.The farm has two hundred acres of grassland and four hundred acres of crops,mostly barley.Animals on the farm at present are two hundred sheep,forty chickens,five dogs and one donkey.Calves and store cattle are also reared. Vehicles are one cattle lorry,one van and five tractors,plus a combined harvester.The farm was built in seventeen eightynine.The newest building was built three years ago in nineteen eightytwo.Two of the farmer's sons work on the farm with him.
